howToBid.title: How to Bid on MazadClick
howToBid.subtitle: Follow our simple guide to participate in auctions and start bidding on your favorite items with confidence.
howToBid.stepDescription: Our step-by-step guide will help you navigate through the bidding process effortlessly.
howToBid.proTipsSubtitle: Maximize your chances of winning auctions with these expert strategies.
howToBid.strategicTimesDesc: Place bids near closing time to minimize counter-bidding and increase your chances of winning.
howToBid.maxBidsDesc: Use the auto-bid feature to set your maximum bid amount and let the system incrementally bid for you.
howToBid.researchValueDesc: Know the market value of items before bidding to avoid overpaying and make informed decisions.
howToBid.faqSubtitle: Get answers to common questions about bidding on MazadClick.
howToBid.multipleWins: What happens if I win multiple auctions?
howToBid.multipleWinsDesc: If you win multiple auctions, you'll need to complete payment for each one separately. You can view all your won auctions in your dashboard and process payments for each item individually.
howToBid.cancelBid: Can I cancel a bid after placing it?
howToBid.cancelBidDesc: Once placed, bids cannot be cancelled or retracted. Please ensure you're committed to purchasing the item before placing a bid, as all bids are binding.
howToBid.outbid: How do I know if I've been outbid?
howToBid.outbidDesc: You'll receive real-time notifications when someone outbids you. Enable notifications in your account settings to stay updated on your auction status.
howToBid.paymentMethodsDesc: MazadClick accepts various payment methods including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and popular digital wallets. Available payment options will be displayed when you win an auction.
howToBid.readyToStartDesc: Join thousands of bidders on MazadClick and discover unique items at great prices.

createAccount.title: Create an Account
createAccount.description: Sign up or log in to your MazadClick account to access auctions.
createAccount.details: To participate in auctions, you'll need a registered account. Click on the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner of the homepage and fill out the required information. Once registered, you can access your dashboard, manage your profile, and track your bidding activities.

browseAuctions.title: Browse Auctions
browseAuctions.description: Explore available auctions to find items that interest you.
browseAuctions.details: Navigate to the auction section from the homepage or use the search functionality to find specific items. You can filter auctions by category, price range, or auction end time. Each auction listing includes detailed information about the item, starting bid, current bid, and time remaining.

understandDetails.title: Understand Item Details
understandDetails.description: Review the item description, condition, images, and seller information.
understandDetails.details: Before placing a bid, carefully examine all information provided about the item. Check multiple images from different angles, read the detailed description, verify the condition assessment, and review the seller's rating and history. If you have questions, use the 'Ask Seller' feature to get clarification.

placeBid.title: Place Your Bid
placeBid.description: Enter your bid amount and confirm your participation in the auction.
placeBid.details: To place a bid, enter an amount that is at least the minimum bid increment above the current highest bid. Review your bid carefully before submitting. Once confirmed, your bid is binding, and you will be notified if you are outbid or if you win the auction. You can set up automatic bidding to compete up to your maximum amount.

monitorBids.title: Monitor Your Bids
monitorBids.description: Track the status of your bids and stay updated on auction progress.
monitorBids.details: Use your dashboard to monitor all active bids. Enable notifications to receive alerts when you're outbid or when an auction is ending soon. You can place additional bids at any time before the auction closes. The time remaining is displayed in real-time to help you make timely decisions.

winComplete.title: Win and Complete Purchase
winComplete.description: If you win, follow the payment instructions to complete your purchase.
winComplete.details: When you win an auction, you'll receive a notification with payment instructions. Complete the payment within the specified timeframe to secure your item. Various payment methods are available, including credit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets. After payment, you can arrange for delivery or pickup based on the seller's options.
